solution_line_template: Permutate the ingredients. {num_cheese_options} cheeses * {num_meat_options} meats * {num_vegetable_options} vegetables = <<{num_cheese_options}*{num_meat_options}*{num_vegetable_options}={total_combinations_initial}>>{total_combinations_initial} choice

However, we must take out the combinations that could have pepperoni and peppers, {restricted_cheese_count} cheese +{restricted_meat_count} meat *+{restricted_vegetable_count} vegetable = <<{restricted_cheese_count}+{restricted_meat_count}+{restricted_vegetable_count}={bad_choices}>>{bad_choices} bad choices
